name: Start with NOThInG (KerDelos, schadocalex, Tyrannas)
description:
Oh no ! You’ve lost your favourite Flask! No way to continue your experiments without it. But thankfully you start with NOThInG! Nitrogen! Oxygen! Thorium! Indium! Gravitium! (You got us there, it doesn’t exist but it’s quite convenient.) Learn how each elements behave to reach your precious flask. Good luck !

Controls & Information

Arrows : Move

S : Pickup element

D : Drop element

R : Restart level

M : Return to menu

You loose if you run out of oxygen or are exposed to too much radioactivity, take care !

Player can hold two elements.

Crates can hold two elements.

Generator can hold one element.

Credits

Graphics : Charliecoding, Tyrannas

Programming : CaptShampoing, Erilhir, Schadocalex

Audio : Kerdelos

Additionnal Programming : Kerdelos, Tyrannas!
